1000020.name: Organ Corruption
1000020.description:
Organ Corruption is a First Person Shooter with procedurally generated missions to eliminate corrupted biotech CEOs. You're a bounty hunter hired to do the job. You can choose the way you complete the missions, stealth, violent, augment yourself through organ gathering and crafting using the laboratories.

  • Fast Paced responsive tactical shooting
  • Difficult
  • Remove your own eye
  • Biological weapons
  • Limited Ammunition
  • Life Decisions: sacrifice organs to augment them
  • Multiple routes to solve the missions
  • Secrets
  • Enemies include: Security guards, Doctors, Scientists, Failed Experiments, Drones, Bio Turrets...
  • Don't eat too much

Note: The game is in development and features detailed here are subject to change
